ThingDef.label: Slime
ThingDef.description: Slime eats everything。What it digests slowly turns into a mucus that resembles the nutrient paste meal. While colonists can eat the mucus, it is very unpalatable.

ThingDef.label: Preta
ThingDef.description: Preta is a type of demon that gets hungry easily. It will carry Segaki Rice with it. When it's full, it might give you that rice. However you never know when it will be full.

ThingDef.label: Pixie
ThingDef.description: Pixie is a friendly goblin who offers the berries she picks to the hungry.

ThingDef.label: Kaya-no-Hime
ThingDef.description: Kaya-no-Hime is the goddess of grass. Colonists can periodically harvest some grass from her, which seems to be the same thing as the hay in rimworld, and can be used to feed animals.

ThingDef.label: Mandrake
ThingDef.description: Mandrake of the rimworld seems to have a habit of migrating, it no longer stays in place like grass forever, nor does it scream when disturbed. The leaves of Mandrake can be used as medicinal herbs.

ThingDef.label: Fomorian
ThingDef.description: Fomorian is a giant sheep 。It eats a lot, but also produces a lot of wool.

ThingDef.label: Pyro Jack
ThingDef.description: Pyro Jack is always looking for wood to use as fuel for its lanterns. It doesn't mind sharing some of the wood it finds with you, even if you don't know where it got them. In any case, in a desert with few trees, this is a good way to get wood.

ThingDef.label: Jack Frost
ThingDef.description: Jack Frost is a well-known mascot! It is happy to share the money it earns with its friends.

ThingDef.label: Black Frost
ThingDef.description: Black Frost wants to become king, so it tries to win people over through alcohol and tobacco and build a new kingdom in rimworld.

ThingDef.label: Decarabia
ThingDef.description: Decarabia is very researched on gems, and it is also good at finding gems.

ThingDef.label: Mothman
ThingDef.description: Mothman is a very mysterious creature, it is believed to be related to aliens. The colonists, however, did not care where it came from, only the precious insect jelly that it produced.

ThingDef.label: Fafnir
ThingDef.description: Fafnir is a dragon that guards treasures. After gaining its trust, you can get some gold from it. Of course, this gold is not cursed! In addition, Fafnir's shed skin can be used as steel.

ThingDef.label: Moh Shuvuu
ThingDef.description: Moh Shuvuu is a bird demon in the form of a girl. After befriending her, she will give you chocolate from time to time. Where did these chocolates come from, you ask? Hey, it's time to be content with a cute girl giving you a gift! Don't care about that.

ThingDef.label: Nue
ThingDef.description: Nue has the head of a monkey, the limbs of a tiger, and the tail of a snake. When the colonists tried to weave with Nue wool , they were surprised to find that Nue wool was closer to cloth made of cotton than animal wool.

ThingDef.label: Zhu Tun She
ThingDef.description: Zhu Tun She is a demon that resembles both a pig and a snake. In rimworld, it can dig up edible mushrooms from the ground. Some colonists will raise Zhu Tun She in large numbers for mushrooms.

ThingDef.label: Sudama
ThingDef.description: Sudama is the spirit of the mountain. As a Jirae, it can sometimes even unearth uranium buried deep in the ground.

ThingDef.label: Kodama
ThingDef.description: Kodama is the spirit that live in century-old trees. Treat it kindly, and the colonists can get Ambrosia as a gift.

ThingDef.label: Nahobino
ThingDef.description: A young man who would become God. His power is enough to defeat any demon.

ThingDef.label: Demi-fiend
ThingDef.description: A young man who gained demon power. His power is enough to defeat any god.
